titleInfo.title: Was brought to the City Police Jail.

subject.geographic: Brickyard at Greenville, Jefferson Parish, La

mods.abstract: WAS brought to the CIty Police Jail on the 13th inst., the black boy WILSON ; is 5 feet 3 inches high ; is about 27 years old ; has big lipsSays he belongs to MrJosMenard who keeps a brickyard at Greenville, Parish JeffersonThe owner is requested to call and claim said slave according to lawEPLANCHARD, Keeper of the City Police Jialmy17 15t

detail.title: New Orleans daily crescent([New Orleans, La.]) 1851-1866

mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.

Physical rights are retained by the LSU LibrariesCopyright has expired and the item is therefore in the public domainPermission to reproduce this image must be requested through the Special Collections Department, Louisiana State University Libraries.
mods.note: Louisiana Runaway Slave Advertisements, 1836-1865, Louisiana Digital Library, Baton Rouge, La.
